question: The government of India has launched a new web portal named NIKSHAY to monitor the cases for which of the following diseases in India?
explanation: In order to monitor the Tuberculosis cases and its control in the country, the National Information Centre (NIC) has developed a new web portal called NIKSHAY. This portal is being used by health functionaries at various levels across the country in association with Central TB Division (CTD), Ministry of Health & Family Welfare.
